bientity_action.description: If specified, this bi-entity action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this bi-entity action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

item_action.description: If specified, this item action will be executed on the item that was picked up.
item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this item action will be executed on the item that was picked up.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the actions will only be executed if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the actions will only be executed if this bi-entity condition is fulfilled by either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

item_condition.description: If specified, the actions will only be executed if this item condition is fulfilled by the item about to be picked up.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the actions will only be executed if this item condition is fulfilled by the item about to be picked up.

priority.description: Determines the execution priority of the powers that use this power type (in a low-to-high priority order.)
priority.markdownDescription: Determines the execution priority of the powers that use this power type (in a low-to-high priority order.)
